WorkItem.Description: I've tried to install the add-in [(ver 2.06)] that seems to say that it will install for all versions of Visual Studio. However I don't see it in the list of add-ins or the options in Visual Studio 2012 RC.
WorkItem.Summary: Can't see the Chirpy add-in in VS 2012 RC

Comments.Message:
Check in your add-in folder 
C:\Users\<username>\Documents\Visual Studio 11\AddIns

by default vsi copy file to C:\Users\<username>\Documents\Visual Studio 2012\Addins

I am having the same issue.

I verified that Chirpy is in the Visual Studio 2012\Addins folder but the extension still doesn't appear or function in Visual Studio 2012 RC

@wilkinsonj

In visual studio 2012 RC the add-in folder is 
\Visual Studio 11\AddIns

And in file  "Zippy.Addin"
<HostApplication>
		<Name>Microsoft Visual Studio</Name>
		<Version>11.0</Version>
</HostApplication>
